mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_history( seq, employee_id, reg_date, annual_days, leave_start_date, leave_end_date, content, status ) VALUES( S_LEAVE_HIS.NEXTVAL, #{employee_id}, #{reg_date}, #{annual_days}, #{leave_start_date}, #{leave_end_date}, #{content}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT lh.seq, lh.reg_date, e.name FROM leave_history lh JOIN employees e ON lh.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE lh.status = 0 ORDER BY lh.seq DESC
SELECT seq, employee_id, TO_CHAR(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, annual_days, status FROM leave_history WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id} ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT e.name, e.employee_id, e.phone_num, d.department_name, d.manager_name, lh.seq, TO_CHAR(lh.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, lh.annual_days, TO_CHAR(lh.leave_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS leave_start_date, TO_CHAR(lh.leave_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS leave_end_date, lh.content, lh.status FROM leave_history lh JOIN employees e ON lh.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.department_id WHERE lh.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE leave_history SET reg_date = #{reg_date}, leave_start_date = #{leave_start_date}, leave_end_date = #{leave_end_date}, annual_days = #{annual_days}, content = #{content}, status = 0 WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE leave_history SET status = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE leave_history SET status = 2 WHERE seq = #{seq}
